answerText: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy[10] This man played George Smiley in the 1979 miniseries of Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy. This actor played the unfortunate members of the D'Ascoyne family in Kind Hearts and Coronets and Obi-Wan Kenobi in Star Wars.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 1 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This movie ends with Julio Iglesias singing "La Mer" and someone shooting Colin Firth in the face. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 2011 film based on a John le Carr√© novel, in which a Gary Oldman played George Smiley is first forced into retirement and then brought back to uncover a Soviet mole.
